ygData.subject: Greetings and Salutations
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all.  As welcomes seem to be the order of the day, I will add mine = to the list.  I am Shadowwalker, High Elf Wizard on the Karana server, = currently
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all. As welcomes seem to be the order of the day, I will add mine =
to the list. I am Shadowwalker, High Elf Wizard on the Karana server, =
currently at level 11. I have been spending time around the Steamfont =
Mino cave with my guild, though we recently went exploring a bit in =
Dagnot's Cauldron, which is intimidating to say the least. Really neat =
looking though. We also spend time in Butcherblock and Lesser Faydark =
occationally as well.

I do have a question in case someone here knows. Does anyone know of =
quests in Faydwer that can be taken on, besides the wolf pelt one?

-Shadowwalker of Karana
